title: What’s the Status of Flaunting Your Status?
excerpt: In the world of the ultrawealthy, luxury is only quiet if you don’t know what to listen for.

title: Payless punks fashionistas by opening a fake luxury store and inviting them to comment on its 'designer' shoes
excerpt: Bargain shoe chain Payless recently took over a Santa Monica retail shop and turned it into Palessi, a luxury store selling their bargain shoes. Then they invited influencers to the…

title: Why So Many Luxury Brands Are Terrible at Ecommerce
excerpt: Until recently, a lack of digital prioritization and desire to control access have led to sub-par luxury ecommerce experiences. Many luxury brands are struggling to improve.
